question_text: What is the primary focus of the course described, in the context of the field of Cardiology?

options.A: To enhance medical research and development

options.D: To advance medical technology and equipment

question_text: What is the primary goal of a dietitian when creating a personalized diet plan for a client?

options.A: To restrict calorie intake as much as possible
options.B: To promote healthy eating habits and meet nutritional needs
options.C: To focus solely on weight loss rather than overall health
options.D: To recommend supplements instead of whole foods

question_text: What is the primary goal of global health initiatives in addressing health challenges worldwide?

options.A: To reduce economic inequalities between countries
options.B: To improve access to healthcare services and reduce health disparities
options.C: To increase the use of technology in healthcare systems
options.D: To promote tourism in developing countries

options.B: To understand and promote overall well-being
options.C: To develop pharmaceutical treatments for mental health

question_text: What is the primary goal of the pre-formulation stage in the development of a pharmaceutical product?

options.A: To design the packaging of the final product
options.B: To determine the stability and compatibility of the active ingredient with excipients
options.C: To conduct clinical trials in human subjects
options.D: To market and distribute the product to pharmacies

question_text: What is the primary role of exercise in the context of physical therapy rehabilitation?

options.C: To support the recovery process and improve overall function
options.D: To replace manual therapy techniques entirely
